title: Frustrating fun with letters
content:
[http://www.lunchtimers.com/games/letters/](http://web.archive.org/web/20071117081321/http:/www.lunchtimers.com/games/letters/ "http://www.lunchtimers.com/games/letters/")

 [‹ Photo Typesetting ... resource?](http://web.archive.org/web/20071117081321/http:/typophile.com/node/17067 "Go to previous forum topic") [Relishing Requiem ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071117081321/http:/typophile.com/node/17052 "Go to next forum topic")
author: John Hudson

comments.content: I was trying to spell future and before I got the T in place a C and a K zoomed in to complete an entirely different word. I’m not playing that nasty game anymore.
